messages.subject: Anyone in the Southern Califonia area?
messages.msgSnippet: Just thought I d ask if anyone here lives in the Southern California area...  I m in San Diego.  If there are any members in the area who would like to get
messages.messageBody:
Just thought I'd ask if anyone here lives in the Southern California
area... I'm in San Diego. If there are any members in the area who
would like to get together for nihonto discussions, drop me an e-
mail...

Steve
